item.title: R2 DAY1-01 Easy Map Applications Using Python - Victor Gau (PyCon APAC 2015)
item.description:
Description

Speaker: Victor Gau

When it comes to creating map applications, javascript is always the first choice among different languages. Little do people know that it is actually very easy to create map applications by using Python. In this talk, three topics will be covered: (1) static map applications, (2) interactive map applications, and (3) real time Google Earth applications. In the first topic, I will demonstrate how to use python with Google Static Maps API to create static map images. After that, Flask-GoogleMaps and Folium will be introduced to create interactive map applications. Finally, I will demonstrate how to use python to create real time Google Earth applications.

About the speaker

Software Engineer Volunteer @ Kaohsiung Python User Group, Kaohsiung UseR Meetup

Twitter @runrunvictor 組織/公司 Jetway Hi-Tech Inc. 頭銜 Manager of R&D Department

https://tw.pycon.org/2015apac/zh/program/63
item.dc:creator: Victor Gau

item.title: 用Python實作環境偵測及預警系統 – Victor Gau (PyCon Taiwan 2021)
item.description:
Description

Day 2, 11:30-12:00

Abstract

在這個講題中，我們使用Python實作了一個智慧物聯網系統，用它來協助維護濕地生態。這個系統涵蓋了六個部分：即時水質監測、即時生態監測、AI生態分析、監控主控台、監控機器人、及資料開放平台等等。最後，我們會使用Raspberry Pi跟DHT11溫溼度感測器實做一個簡單的物聯網雛型。

Description

這個計畫分成六個部分：即時水質監測、即時生態監測、AI生態分析、監控主控台、監控機器人、資料開放平台，而在本次分享中，我們會將重點放在物聯網的雛形的部分。我們會DEMO如何在Raspberry Pi上面進行遠端開發，利用筆電上的Visual Studio Code直接開發程式讀取連接在Raspberry Pi上面的DHT11的溫濕度讀值，並讓RPi透過MQTT將溫濕度傳給MQTT Broker；在筆電端我們會啟動一個主控台接收自MQTT Broker傳來的溫濕度數據，並呈現在網頁上。

Slides not uploaded by the speaker. HackMD: https://hackmd.io/@pycontw/2021/%2F%40pycontw%2Fr1aeD7czF

Speaker: Victor Gau

軟體工程師 Kaohsiung.py 義工
item.dc:creator: Victor Gau
